participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: cheerful and optimistic, always looking for the silver lining in every situation.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up in a small town and has always had a passion for art and community service. She works as a graphic designer.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and analytical, often takes time to ponder before responding.
participant_2.background: Michael is a software engineer who enjoys hiking and photography. He values deep conversations and learning new perspectives.
